t: What is the phone number for Amazon Canada?

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - Amazon.com, Inc., doing business as Amazon (/ˈæməzɒn/ ⓘ, AM-ə-zon; UK also /ˈæməzən/, AM-ə-zən), is an American multinational technology company engaged in e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: At Amazon Verbiage in the call-to-action button is incorrect. “at Amazon.com” should always be used. Offsite static ads that link in to Amazon, should clearly display the “available at Amazon” logo or the appropriate text link CTA. At Amazon Creative may not use Amazon branded buttons ...

t: How to Contact Amazon: Phone Numbers, Chat Features, & More
s: March 11, 2025 - Although they don’t have an email address you can send requests or complaints to, we’ve rounded up the phone numbers, chat URL, support pages, and customer service options you can use to get your issue resolved ASAP. Call Amazon at 1-888-280-4331 for 24/7 customer service.

t: How to contact Amazon customer service: A complete guide
s: January 9, 2025 - In the U.S., anyone can join Prime for $14.99 per month or $139 per year, or start a free 30-day trial if eligible and enjoy Prime Video, Amazon Music, Prime Gaming, RxPass, Grubhub+, Amazon Photos, Prime exclusive deals, and more.

t: Amazon Customer Service Phone Number (888) 280-4331, Email, Help Center
s: Yes, 1-800-388-5512 is one more Amazon customer care number. Customers from the U.S. and Canada can use this number for account-related inquiries. You can call this helpline if you're unable to access your account due to issues with two-step verification or need to reset your password.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: How to Contact Amazon: Customer Service, Phone, Live Chat
s: March 8, 2025 - For any product inquiries or order issues, contact Amazon's customer service team through the website or by calling 1-888-280-4331.

t: Support Options and Customer Service - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help during your shopping journey, we offer a number of self-service options that allow you to solve your issue without having to contact us. Below are some useful self-serve links for your assistance.

t: Amazon Customer Care Number for Emergency - Amazon Customer Service
s: In case of emergency contact Amazon via the Amazon Customer Care Number available 24*7. Follow the steps below to report emergency issues.

t: Contact Brand Manufacturer - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · If the item has missing parts or accessories or encounter any issues, please reach out to their respective brand's customer service department. Their customer service team is well equipped and will help troubleshoot the device and resolve your issues

t: Amazon Customer Service Phone Number 888-280-4331: Call Support
s: February 23, 2009 - We call and talk to Amazon Customer Service for you, or wait on hold and get a live rep for you- for free. If you want to do the dialing, waiting, and talking yourself, we tell you the best time to call, how to talk to a real person, and what to say.
